title: Get to know me!
items: I'm a Backend-Focused Developer building and managing scalable backend services, APIs, and real-time applications that drive the success of digital products.
I specialize in designing and optimizing **microservices, distributed systems, and event-driven architectures** to ensure high-performance and reliability.
Passionate about open-source contributions and problem-solving, I love turning innovative ideas into reality.
Check out some of my work in the Projects section!
I'm open to Job opportunities where I can contribute, learn and grow. If you have a good opportunity that matches my skills and experience then don't hesitate to contact me.
